name: 3D CG Style| Realistic
description:
This lora imitates the style of 3D rendering;

checkpoint : chilloutmix_Ni or other you like

weight: 1

You can also try to use it with other character lora, such as some of my pictures, but it is best to use lora-block-weight to optimize the generation of pictures
